name: Destiny Hunter
description: Destiny Hunter is a story based RPG game in which you can control two characters, a female warrior and a female Archer. The story is about searching a better place to live and of course find your Destiny. You need to pass through cold places and reach into a better place to finish the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 660 2GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Device Default
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 4.6 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2060 6GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Device Default
